data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (memory_free IS NULL OR memory_free > 0.0) AND (memory_used IS NULL OR memory_used < memory_total)) AS 'Health Score' FROM amazon_opsworks_instance FACET amazon_opsworks_instance_name
SELECT uniqueCount(amazon_opsworks_instance_name) AS 'Instances' FROM amazon_opsworks_instance FACET region

presentation.title: Region Distribution
presentation.notes: The AWS Region this object belongs to.

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(amazon_opsworks_instance_name) AS 'Instances' FROM amazon_opsworks_instance FACET type

presentation.title: Type Distribution
presentation.notes: The Instance type, such as t2.micro.

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(amazon_opsworks_instance_name) AS 'Instances' FROM amazon_opsworks_instance FACET platform
SELECT average(active_processes) FROM amazon_opsworks_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(cpu_system) FROM amazon_opsworks_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: CPU System (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percentage of time that the CPU is handling system operations.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cpu_user) FROM amazon_opsworks_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: CPU User (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percentage of time that the CPU is handling user operations.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cpu_wait_io) FROM amazon_opsworks_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: CPU Wait I/O (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percentage of time that the CPU is waiting for input/output operations.

data.nrql: SELECT average(load_average_for_5_minutes) FROM amazon_opsworks_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Load Average for 5 Minutes
presentation.notes: The load averaged over a five-minute window.

data.nrql: SELECT average(memory_free) FROM amazon_opsworks_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(memory_swap) FROM amazon_opsworks_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(memory_used) FROM amazon_opsworks_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Memory Used (Bytes)
presentation.notes: The amount of memory in use.
